divs: Sighting DetailsI was waiting for my buddy to come over he called me and told me to look out the window right away I went outside and saw about 15 or more lights dancing in the sky. Couldnt really tell which direction they were heDed. They were changing formTion and then just kind disappears up into the atmosphere . it looks like they communicate with each other by blinking and movemint as time went on summer disappearing getting smaller and changing tomorrow maroon color. No clouds in the sky at time, but minutes later they left clouds behind like ocword clouds are forming weird spotted twirling shapes
Summary: Multiple lights dancing im the sky
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
